name: Soham
greetingText: Let me make this special again !
wishText: You might not realize how special you are to me after what happened, but I swear I wanted our friendship to last forever. Please try to forgive my mistake and lets move on to be bff's forever, I really miss us everyday. May all your dreams comes true. Wish you all happiness my MINI ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, caz I spent 5 fcking night creating this animated shit ðŸ˜‚
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
